hero.heading: Full-stack web studio for modern businesses
hero.lead: We design, build, and optimize digital experiences that convert. From strategy to launch and beyond.

sections.title: What we do
sections.body: Product strategy, UX/UI, and performance-focused engineering tailored to your market.

sections.title: Why choose us
sections.body: Senior team, transparent process, and measurable outcomes backed by modern tooling.

sections.title: Delivery model
sections.body: Iterative sprints with clear milestones, paired with continuous optimization and support.

services.title: What We Deliver
services.subtitle: End-to-end digital solutions tailored to your business goals.

items.title: Web Development
items.description: High-performance Next.js applications with SSR, ISR, and edge rendering for blazing-fast user experiences.

items.title: Mobile Apps
items.description: Cross-platform mobile applications built with React Native, delivering native performance on iOS and Android.

items.title: UI/UX Design
items.description: Research-driven design systems and interfaces that balance aesthetics with conversion-focused usability.

items.title: Cloud & DevOps
items.description: Scalable infrastructure on AWS and GCP with CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and zero-downtime deployments.

process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: A proven four-phase approach that turns ideas into production-ready products.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We dive deep into your business goals, audience, and competitive landscape to define a clear product strategy.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Interactive prototypes and a polished design system that aligns stakeholders before a single line of code is written.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Iterative sprints with continuous integration, code reviews, and automated testing to ship reliable software fast.

steps.title: Launch & Support
steps.description: Zero-downtime deployment, performance monitoring, and ongoing optimization to keep you ahead of the curve.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by startups and enterprises across Southeast Asia.

items.name: Natcha Srimanee
items.text: Acme Services rebuilt our payment dashboard in 6 weeks. The performance improvements were immediate and our conversion rate jumped by 34%.

items.name: James Harrington
items.text: From wireframes to production, the team delivered exceptional quality. Their process is transparent and their communication is top-notch.

items.name: Siriporn Wattana
items.text: We needed a reliable partner for our mobile app launch. Acme Services exceeded every timeline and the app runs flawlessly.

cta.heading: Ready to Build Something Great?
cta.subtext: Let us turn your vision into a high-performing digital product. Book a free strategy call today.

hero.heading: Services built to ship fast and scale

sections.title: Discovery & Strategy

hero.heading: A senior team focused on outcomes

sections.title: Leadership
sections.body: Led by staff-level engineers and product designers with global launch experience.

sections.title: Process
sections.body: Lean discovery, prototype-first, and data-informed iterations from day one.

sections.title: Tooling
sections.body: Modern stack with automated testing, accessibility gates, and observability by default.

hero.heading: Transparent pricing for every stage
hero.lead: Pick a plan or tailor a custom engagement. No lock-in, clear deliverables.

sections.title: Starter
sections.body: 2-week sprint: audit, UX refresh, and performance tuning. Fixed scope, fixed fee.

sections.title: Growth
sections.body: Monthly retainer: roadmap delivery, experiments, and design system maintenance.

sections.title: Dedicated squad
sections.body: Embedded team with SLAs, on-call support, and continuous delivery pipelines.

hero.heading: Let's talk about your next release
